directions: [["Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat then add the onions and garlic. Cook for a few minutes until onions soften. Add the chicken and cook until lightly browned."],["Add 3/4 of the beer, reserving the rest, then cook for a couple of minutes to reduce. "],["Add the tomatoes, chipotles, beans, chili powder, cumin and salt. Stir to combine, then cover the pot and cook for 1 hour. "],["Combine the masa harina with the rest of the beer and stir to make a paste. Add this into the chili, along with the lime juice. Stir and cook for 10 more minutes or until thick. "],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
notes: Serve with sour cream, cheese, cilantro, and another squeeze of lime!
